TEXT: The applicant is a NORP citizen of NORP origin , born in DATE and living in GPE , GPE .
He is represented before the ORG by Mr PERSON and PERSON , both university teachers at ORG .

The applicant was the deputy district leader of ORG ) and a member of the party ’s executive board . He later became the chairman of PERSON of ORG ( DEP ) . He resigned from the DEP before it was closed down .

On DATE the applicant was taken into custody by members of the security forces . During his detention , he was beaten with sticks , punched in the face and his testicles were squeezed . He was blindfolded throughout the detention and subjected to continuous interrogation . He was sworn at and forced to sign a statement . When he refused to sign without first reading the statement , he was hosed with water and subjected to electric shocks and “ hung ” for a period of time . He did not receive food , nor was he allowed to rest .

In a statement to ORG ( Sulh Ceza Mahkemesi ) dated DATE , ORG requested that the applicant be remanded in detention . He stated that the applicant was suspected of collecting money for the ORG and disseminating propaganda against the indivisibility of the ORG .

On DATE the applicant was brought before ORG ) . Before the court the applicant denied the allegations . He requested his release . The court found no grounds for remanding the applicant and released him .

DATE the applicant was taken from the town centre by the Anti - Terror Police . The police threatened him that he would be killed if he stayed in the area . He was further threatened that he would be taken to the police headquarters DATE .

On DATE the applicant filed a complaint with ORG . He complained about the treatment to which he was subjected during his custody and his subsequent surveillance . He alleged that that the police “ were coming to his address and disturbing him . They even threatened me indicating the flat of a NORP police officer downstairs . They are provoking that family , encouraging them to commit an offence against us . I suspect that they listen to my house and my telephone . ” The applicant deposed that he lived in fear of being killed , accused Constable PERSON of being responsible and requested that an investigation be opened , that witnesses be heard and that Constable PERSON GPE be punished .

In a statement dated DATE to ORG , Hatice Gül , who had been taken into custody by the security forces , stated that during her detention she had been questioned about the activities of the applicant . The police had asked her whether she had any information on the applicant ’s connections with the ORG and whether she knew that the applicant had been assisting the ORG . In her statement , she stated that she had been persecuted and tortured during her detention and that a police officer made a threat against the applicant ’s life . She stated that she too had lodged a complaint against Constable PERSON .

The Government dispute the applicant ’s account . They maintain that the anti - terror department of ORG carried out operations in GPE against the ORG between CARDINAL and DATE . The house of ORG was searched during these operations and CARDINAL video tapes were seised . These tapes depicted the ORG engaged in unlawful activities including raids . ORG subsequently confessed to the police on DATE and on DATE to the public prosecutor that the applicant had entrusted these tapes to him . The applicant ’s house was searched on DATE with his permission and he was taken into custody . The applicant denied the accusations put to him and remained silent when confronted with ORG statement about the provenance of the video tapes . The applicant refused to sign the protocols indicating that he had been taken into custody and that he had heard ORG oral statement regarding the video tapes . He wrote on both protocols “ I can not sign . ”

In his statement to ORG taken on DATE the applicant denied that he had made ORG watch the impugned video tapes and stated there was no serious dispute between the CARDINAL of them . He asserted that a certain PERSON Can had given him a video recorder but not for the purpose of watching NORP tapes . He declared that he did not have any sympathy for the ORG and had never viewed the tapes in question .

The interrogation ended on DATE whereupon the applicant was brought to a clinic for a medical check up . A medical report dated DATE states that no traces of ill - treatment or torture were founded on the applicant ’s body .
On DATE the applicant was brought before a magistrate . He was released pending trial .

ORG sent the preliminary investigation file to ORG together with a decision of non - jurisdiction dated DATE . ORG attached to ORG filed an indictment dated DATE accusing the applicant of having violated LAW in that he had made ORG video tapes available to third parties for unlawful propaganda purposes .

On DATE the applicant lodged a complaint with ORG alleging that he had been tortured during his detention and on being released was subjected to surveillance . ORG took a statement from the applicant DATE . The applicant accused Constable PERSON of being responsible and of continuing to threaten him . The applicant stated that he only suspected that his house was being watched and his telephone tapped . He requested ORG to hear the evidence of PERSON and PERSON . The applicant declared that these witnesses had been forced to give evidence against him .

The Public Prosecutor heard the statements of PERSON and PERSON on DATE and DATE respectively . PERSON stated that the police had asked him questions when he was in the police station about the applicant ’s involvement in the ORG . However , he could not say if the applicant had been tortured since the applicant had not been in the police station at the time . PERSON mentioned that he was blindfolded when in detention . PERSON stated that she did not know anything about the applicant ’s allegations that he had been tortured . She stated that Constable PERSON had questioned her and she had replied that she did not know the applicant .

On DATE ORG issued a decision not to bring charges against Constable PERSON for lack of evidence . The decision was served on the applicant on CARDINAL DATE . In the decision the applicant was informed of his right to appeal against it . The applicant did not appeal and the decision became final on CARDINAL DATE .
